details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport (current and previous) must be submitted at time of application
Basic travel purpose must be tourism or business only (no work, study, or other visa types processed)
Previous visited visa pages (if any) must be submitted
Embassy reserves the right to request an interview or additional documents

details.title: Required Documents
items: Scanned copies of any previously visited visa pages
